title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.13 - Duty to report accidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.13 - Duty to report accidents

State Regulations

The driver shall immediately report to the toll collector any
accident occurring on the bridges in which the vehicle or its occupants are
involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
